ns2:test-suite.name: As a whetherForecast service provider, I should be able to fetch the whether details from the application successfully

test-case.name: Verify that user can able to expand the forecast data and the user is getting forecast after every 3 hours.
test-case.title: Verify that user can able to expand the forecast data and the user is getting forecast after every 3 hours.

step.name: Given Launch Weather Forecast web application
step.title: Given Launch Weather Forecast web application

step.name: Then I should be able to launch the application with header "Five Day Weather Forecast for"
step.title: Then I should be able to launch the application with header "Five Day Weather Forecast for"

step.name: When I enter the stirling for whetherforecast
step.title: When I enter the stirling for whetherforecast

step.name: Then I should able to select a 1
step.title: Then I should able to select a 1

step.name: Then user should see Three hourly forcast for that "1"
step.title: Then user should see Three hourly forcast for that "1"
